hero.title: toMy Kawiarnia Warszawa
hero.subtitle: Social cafe in the heart of Warsaw

about.title: About Us
about.missionText: toMy Kawiarnia is a social cafe run by the Lena Grochowska Foundation. Over 60% of our team consists of people with disabilities, mainly intellectual disabilities. We create a space where employees not only fulfill professional duties but also build self-confidence and acquire new skills.
about.storyText: The Warsaw location, opened in September 2023, is the third point in the toMy social cafe network. We previously opened locations in Siedlce and Gdańsk. We are located in the center of Warsaw, on Aleje Jerozolimskie, near the intersection with Marszałkowska Street.
about.award2: Food Business Awards® - Socially Responsible Cafe
about.award3: UN Nansen Refugee Award 2023 - Lena Grochowska Foundation

menu.title: Our Menu
menu.coffeeDesc: Freshly ground premium coffee served in unique handmade ceramic cups by our talented baristas.
menu.pastriesDesc: Artisan baked goods and famous cheesecakes prepared in our bakery workshop. All desserts made with the highest quality ingredients.
menu.ceramicsDesc: Ceramic workshops for children and adults. Local ceramics made by our talented artists with disabilities available for purchase.
menu.eventsDesc: We organize art workshops and cultural events, creating a space for meetings and integration in the heart of Warsaw.

footer.rights: © 2024 toMy Kawiarnia Warszawa. All rights reserved.
footer.foundation: A project of the Lena Grochowska Foundation
